title: Welding Engineer/Сhief welding engineer
skills:
Specialization: Welding of oil and gas facilities. 
High level of responsibility for the entrusted work area, sociability, diligence, energy, mobility, attentiveness to the smallest details, active life position, ability to work in a team, defending the interests of the organization before customers, leadership and organizational skills, aiming only at a positive result.. 
- National Welding Control Agency 
VIC specialist, 2nd 
National Welding Control Agency 
Certified Welding Engineer, Level IV

primary.name: Don State Technical University, Rostov-na-Donu
primary.organization: Faculty of Mechanical Engineering, Mechanization and automation of welding production,
primary.result: Welding of oil and gas structures

primary.name: Don State Technical University, Rostov-na-Donu
primary.organization: Faculty of Mechanical Engineering, Bachelor degree

experience.description:
Arrangement of a gas field under the conditions of the Far North.
Construction of a linear gas pipeline with a rated diameter of DN 1200 - 9.8 MPa, with the construction of pig launchers, block valve stations (BVS), safety block valve stations (sBVS).
-	Organization of the development and implementation of advanced welding methods in operation, ensuring cost reduction in the performance of welding work. 
-	Organization and execution of work on certification of NAKS (National Welding Control Agency) introduced into production of welding procedures, welding materials and equipment. 
- Organization of attestation (certification) of welders and welding specialists. 
-  Сompletion of a set of permission documentation in welding production.
- Control of compliance with the welding operational conditions, operating and maintenance rules and safe welding performance.  
-	Technical supervision and analysis of the quality of welding production.
- Development and approval of operating procedures and method statements. 
- Quality control of welded joints (VIC, US inspection, x-ray inspection, mechanical testing, ICC).
- Rationing of welding material consumption.
Knowledge of the process and equipment, plasma welding, SMAW, MAGW, SAW, GMAW, mFCAW

• Organization, planning, control of activities, ensuring the fulfillment of contractual obligations of contractors performing construction and installation work. Representation of Customer’s interests when working with representatives of the RF regulatory authorities.
• Issuing of schedule of volumes on the basis of design documentation for the pre-qualification process
• Drawing up technical specifications for construction and installation work
• Monitoring the market of suppliers and contractors
• Drawing up and approval of a set of documents with related services
• Organization and control of operation conditions and safe use, maintenance and repair of buildings and structures 
• Development of local normative acts (regulations, instructions), drawing up plans, schedules, material balances, timesheets, etc 
• Conclusion, maintenance, and control over the fulfillment of contractual obligations with counterparties on the activities of the unit. 
• Office management of the subdivision in the corporate system of electronic document management DIRECTUM. 
• Planning and execution of income and expense budget within the subdivision, timely execution, approval, and entry into the register of payments of applications for spending funds in accordance with contractual obligations.
